original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says: This tree has died and it has gone down into its grave. When that happened, I caused people to be very sad. I caused the springs of water to stop. There were no longer streams with plenty of water. I caused the mountains of Lebanon to become dark. All the trees in the forest became dry.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 그가 스올에 내려가던 날에 내가 그를 위하여 슬프게 울게 하며 깊은 바다를 덮으며 모든 강을 쉬게 하며 큰 물을 그치게 하고 레바논이 그를 위하여 슬프게 울게 하며 들의 모든 나무를 그로 말미암아 쇠잔하게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says:
and it has gone down into its grave.
I caused people to be very sad.
I caused the springs of water to stop.
There were no longer streams with plenty of water.
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 풍부한 물을 가진 개울이 없었습니다.

sentences.original_text: I caused the mountains of Lebanon to become dark.
All the trees in the forest became dry.
sentences.korean_translation: 숲 속의 모든 나무들이 마르게 되었습니다.
